description:
Sante PACS Server PG is a DICOM 3.0 compliant PACS server, a Modality Worklist server, an HTTP (web) server for DICOM files and a CD/DVD Burning and Printing server that offers high performance and reliability at an affordable price.

Sante PACS Server PG is a DICOM 3.0 compliant PACS server, a Modality Worklist server, an HTTP (web) server for DICOM files and a CD/DVD Burning and Printing server that offers high performance and reliability at an affordable price.
It provides connectivity to all DICOM modalities (CT, MR, US, CR, NM, XA, MG, DX etc.). Reviewing the DICOM images can be done using the Sante PACS Viewer (the Built-in full-featured DICOM viewer of the system). The built-in web server can be used as a free cloud server for DICOM files!

If you have selected a cloud solution for DICOM file archiving, Sante PACS Server PG can be a perfect companion of this solution, not only because it can be used as a local backup server for the whole archive, accessible from the web as well, but furthermore because it can keep locally the older part of the archive that there is no need to be on the cloud. This way Sante PACS Server PG can reduce drastically the monthly cost of the cloud solution.

Features and benefits
- full-featured PACS Server that supports all the modalities and all the transfer syntaxes
- full-featured, user configurable, Worklist Server
- Built-in Web Server that allows remote access of the studies to physicians and patients
- Unlimited number of patients/studies/series, the only limitation is the storage size
- Unlimited number of connected medical scanners
- Unlimited number of connected users, locally or remotely, physicians or patients
- Patients can access their studies with tokens instead of user accounts
- Available to remote users two built-in, world class, free DICOM viewers, Sante DICOM Web Viewer and OHIF viewer
- The built-in OHIF DICOM Viewer works in client side without installation in any device (desktop, mobile, tablet) and in any OS (Windows, Linux, MacOS, iOS, Android, etc.).
- Migration tool that allows easy transfer of data to the new system
- Automatic CD/DVD disk burning and label printing in EPSON and PRIMERA robot producers
- It works on Windows Server 2022/2019/2016/2012/2008 or Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7/Vista 64-bit
- Perpetual license (one time purchase, without hidden costs/fees)

Free demo version that works for 90 days
